headline: STERIS Raises Dividend to $0.63 per share
summary: DUBLIN, IRELAND, July 30, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- STERIS plc (NYSE: STE) (“STERIS” or the “Company”) announced today that the Company will distribute a quarterly interim dividend of $0.63 per share. This represents a $0.06 increase in the dividend and the Company’s 20th consecutive year of dividend growth. The dividend is payable on September 26, 2025, to shareholders of record at the close of business on September 4, 2025. Additional information about the U.S. tax treatment of dividends, inclu

headline: Steris (STE) Earnings Expected to Grow: Should You Buy?
summary: Steris (STE) doesn't possess the right combination of the two key ingredients for a likely earnings beat in its upcoming report. Get prepared with the key expectations.
